mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription( id, prescription_id, organization_id, organization_name, pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name, patient_id, patient_name, patient_sex, department_name, doctor_name, pharmacist_name, advice, cost, effective_days, `status`, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{prescriptionId}, #{organizationId}, #{organizationName}, #{pharmacyId}, #{pharmacyName}, #{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{patientSex}, #{departmentName}, #{doctorName}, #{pharmacistName}, #{advice}, #{cost}, #{effectiveDays}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT icd_code FROM prescription_icd where pid = #{pid}

SELECT id AS id, prescription_id AS prescriptionId, organization_id AS organizationId, organization_name AS organizationName, pharmacy_id AS pharmacyId, pharmacy_name AS pharmacyName, patient_id, AS patientId, patient_name, AS patientName, patient_sex, AS patientSex, department_name AS departmentName, doctor_name AS doctorName, pharmacist_name, AS pharmacistName, advice AS advice , cost AS cost, effective_days AS effectiveDays, `status` AS status, create_time AS createTime FROM prescription WHERE id = #{pid}
